title: Gragas needs some love, Zyra passive,
body:
Gragas has not been seen in competitive play for sometime now, 
i feel like his poke range isn't long enough with out putting yourself in tough situations and the risk is rarely rewarding,
does any one else feel this way? 

Also zyra passive is worthless if you dont die which is a waste, it shouldn't encourage death,
maybe bring zyra back to life only on kills with it or change it because zyra skills are limited as it is and its a skill shot so it should be more rewarding.

replies.body: I main Gragas and with his recent buffs i really think he is a good jungler. I find maxing W and rushing Lich Bane and either Zonya's or Deathcap i can do some extreme damage its just his Q is pretty weak but not that bad.
yah but if you were to lane with him what items would you rush first? because he doesn't have alot of damage. iv been playing him support because of his cc and ult but its hard to make good trades

Normally if its a melee match up id still max W and go lich bane, but if im relying on Q poke damage id go morello's. I also like tanky support gragas its good against a leona or braum but if you get a poke support theres not much you can do but peel.
Me thinks, change her passive to fire from her plant on a decent CD and maybe less dmg. Similar to Heimer's charged turret shots. No?
yah that would be cool or even movement speed when your near ur plants would help effectively

there are a lot of champs that haven't been in competitive play for a while. get used to it.
in that same regard, kogmaw passive is useless and karthus passive is useless.
karthus and kogmaw not skill shots tho and zyra's isnt as good as theres.
Change all York's skills, he hasn't been in the lcd :^)
i just mentioned competitive play because of s3 worlds, was  the good days for me.
